program: (PARI) A324348(n) = { my(m1=2, m2=1, p=2, mp=p*p); while(n, if(!(n%2), p=nextprime(1+p); mp = p*p, m1 *= p; if(3==(n%4), mp *= p, m2 *= (mp-1)/(p-1))); n>>=1); ((m1-m2)-hammingweight(m1)); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 24 2019
